name: paste-replaced
description: Pastes the contents of the clipboard, replaced using regular expressions that you configure

paste-replaced.replacers.markdownDescription: An array of arrays of `[search, replace, flags?]` tuples. _**NB:** Only the first item will be used. User this to have a way to save patterns that are not currently active._

items.markdownDescription: An array of `[search, replace, flags?]` tuples. These will be applied to the text in the order they are configured.

A `[search, replace, flags?]` tuple where `search` is a JS regular expression,`replace` is a string, and `flags?` is an optional string. The first occurrence of `search` will be replaced by `replace`, unless the `g` flag is provided.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
